item.title: Python Stuff!
item.description: print("Just wanted to include a picture of some of my plants because why not (:") ## Just wanted to include a picture of some of my plants because why not (: library(reticulate) hi<-"Hello" hi="world" print(r.hi,hi) ## Hello world

item.title: R and Python
item.description: Hey everyone! This website is a compilation of my resume and projects that I completed while taking Computational Biology at UT. The projects were done using both R and Python, I hope everyone likes them!
